title: Data, Protocols, and Animal Health
text: Feed formulation strategy. We record yields and monitor feed intake. We design protocols for herd health management. Irrigation is scheduled to reduce water waste. We rotate pastures to improve forage quality. In winter we protect equipment from freezing. Farm safety rules are part of our routine. Veterinary biosecurity keeps the herd healthy. Sprayer calibration prevents over application. We assess soil nutrients for fertilization plans. We start work before sunrise during harvest. The tractor needs a safety check before operation. We interpret telemetry from precision agriculture systems. The greenhouse helps control temperature and humidity.
